seed.title: Your Recovery Phrase
seed.description: Write down these 24 words in a safe place. You'll need them to recover your wallet.
seed.warning: Never share your recovery phrase. Anyone with access to it can steal your funds.
seed.confirm: I have saved my recovery phrase securely
